name: Business Advisory
shortDescription: Digital marketing, public speaking, legal, and more.
longDescription: We provide formalized business advisory services, powered by a core consulting team and a flexible, curated Expert Advisory Pool. We bridge the gap between global strategy and local execution.

featuresList.title: Financial Structuring
featuresList.description: (optimal legal and financial setup, capital allocation).

featuresList.title: Funding Facilitation
